rules_text:
Players can’t gain life this turn. Damage can’t be prevent this turn. Deafening Blast deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
Catalyze {1}{R} [i](As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may exile this card from your graveyard and pay its catalyze cost. If you do, add this card’s effects to that spell.)[/i]
